name: BoxShooter (rode1o)
description: Welcome to our adrenaline-pumping first-person shooter game, where you find yourself locked in a room with enemies closing in from all sides. Your mission? To annihilate them all before they get you. With an arsenal of weapons at your disposal, you'll need to use your skills and strategy to survive and emerge victorious. Each enemy has their own unique strengths and weaknesses, and as the game progresses, they become increasingly challenging to defeat. Can you handle the pressure and overcome the odds? Play now to find out!
